document_data.mainbody:
he Greenhaven orcs were a tribe who lived in the Far Horns Forest during the time of Netheril.
The Greenhaven orcs performed raids on nearby Netherese towns and villages, and also performed forays into the Moss to hunt trolls. They favored using flaming arrows in their raids, but this ultimately resulted in the enraged trolls massing together and annihilating the tribe during Netherils Silver Age.
